Title: The General Line in socialist construction explained in pictures
Designer: Tianjin People's Fine Arts Publishing House (天津人民美术出版社)
Publisher: Tianjin People's Fine Arts Publishing House (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: The first poster of a four poster set from 1958, "The General Line in socialist construction explained in pictures" (社会主义建设总路线图解).The text on the banner reads "Work hard, strive to reach the top, and build socialism more quickly, better and more cost-effectively". It refers to the proposal made at the second meeting of the Eighth National Congress of the CCP in 1958.
